strength of seasonality, a value close to 1 indicate highly seaonal series
Measure of how easy the series is to forecast. Entropy close to 0 shows a series  is easy to forecast

Number of sections of the data where the series is relatively unchanging
Number of times a time series crosses the median
Extent of nonlinearity, if values around 0  series is linear. Large values shows nonlinearity
Stability is the variance of the means of  tiled (non-overlapping) windows
Hurst coefficient of a time series which is a measure of ong memory
